title: Mundo Broken Again!!??

embed.description: Testing the new Mundo builds out in Ranked. Smashing some gold players easily from the Mundo jungle side. He's very broken now. You can also find on twitter @ https://twitter.com/shaunofdasheep And credit for the soundtrack goes to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DDGzFOyYpsY

body: Testing the new Mundo builds out in Ranked.  Smashing some gold players easily from the Mundo jungle side.  He's very broken now.

replies.body:
His not broken, his just mundo.

Yes he does do a big chunk of damage and has pretty decent clears, but honestly mundo jungle only works if your opponent can't dodge a really simple to dodge skill shot.
